summary: ENGINE CRADLE BROKE, CAUSING THE STEERING TO LOCK UP. I WAS DRIVING APPROXIMATLY 45 MPH STRAIGHT ON A RURAL STATE ROUTE, I BRAKED SLIGHTLY TO SLOW DOWN  THEN THE CAR JUST LOCKED UP AND SLID OFF THE ROAD.  HAD IT TOWED AND FOUND THAT THE ENGINE CRADLE WAS BROKEN.  AFTER DOING SOME RESEARCH I FOUND THIS TO BE A PROBLEM WITH THIS YEAR AND MODEL.
